title: Beyonce's mom guest speaking at the Women Build Luncheon | News | fox13memphis.com
text:
Beyonce's mom will be the guest speaker at the Women Build Luncheon FOX13 Memphis News Staff FOX13 Memphis News Staff Author facebook Author twitter Author email Mar 14, 2024 5 hrs ago Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save MEMPHIS, Tenn. - Tina Knowles will be the guest speaker of the Women's Build Luncheon sharing empowering information to women in the community.
Knowles is a well-known entrepreneur, fashion designer, and philanthropist.
The Great Hall and Conference Center in Germantown, Habitat for Humanity of Greater Memphis is hosting the event on April 10 from 11:30 a.m. to 1:30 p.m.
The luncheon will help raise money for Memphis Habitat's 2024 Women Build projects.
“Women Build is about bringing women together to make housing more affordable in our community. Through this lunch and conversation with Ms. Knowles, we want to inspire and celebrate the stories of empowered women,” said Lori Humber, Memphis Habitat’s Chief Operating Officer.
If you would like to attend, you can purchase tickets here.

organizations.name: habitat for humanity of greater memphis
